tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SensorLogs (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id UUID,
  reading DECIMAL,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES MoistureSensorData(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MoistureSensorData (
  sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_name STRING,
  soil_type STRING,
  moisture_level FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE SensorLocation (
  location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id UUID,
  location_name STRING,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT
);
CREATE TABLE sensors (sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sensor_name TEXT, location TEXT, moisture_level DECIMAL(5,2));
CREATE TABLE readings (reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sensor_id INT, reading_time TIMESTAMP, moisture_level DECIMAL(5,2));
CREATE TABLE locations (location_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location_name TEXT, longitude DECIMAL(8,6), latitude DECIMAL(8,6));
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username TEXT, email TEXT, role TEXT);

CREATE TABLE moisture_sensors (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    moisture_level DECIMAL,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE soil_conditions (
    sensor_id INT,
    moisture_level DECIMAL,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    soil_type VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES moisture_sensors(sensor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    log_message TEXT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES moisture_sensors(sensor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    alert_message TEXT,
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES moisture_sensors(sensor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_metadata (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
    installation_date DATE,
    last_update TIMESTAMP
)
